lead_paragraph: Krissy Wendell scored her 99th and 100th goals for the United States women’s team to lead the Americans to a 5-2 victory over Finland yesterday in the Four Nations Cup in Kitchener, Ontario. Wendell is the third player to reach the 100-goal mark for the American team, joining Cammi Granato and Katie King. The United States is 1-1, and Finland fell to 0-2. Canada (2-0) won by 7-0 over Sweden (1-1) last night.
